EmailTemplate.subject: STARTING NOW: Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Starting Now Complimentary Live Webinar: Transitioning from Paper to Electronic Patient Care Reporting
JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/vkyzkhv
AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial the toll free number on your screen when you login
DATE: November 10, 2011 TIME: 2 PM Eastern | 1 PM Central l Noon Mountain | 11 AM Pacific PRESENTER: Larry Cole, EMT-P, Former Director of Finance and Corporate Compliance Trouble Logging In? Call 800.799.4510 for the iLinc Support Team Help
We hope you can attend!
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
